name: SKAL (HOTdoGsk8ter)
description:
It is free drink night at the local tavern but with a catch... All drinks are rewarded through completion of microgames! Master 7 microgames (and possibly more in the future..) to obtain a ridiculous amount of drinks and possibly put the tavern in massive debt in... SKÅL !

HOW TO PLAY: 

- Most games require mouse click or WASD 

- Do what it tells you!
